line.comment: * $return = open custom menu: title=$title description=$description option array=$menu callback script='Menu.Template.SM' args=$args
* Note that to retrieve $return, you must use 'add custom menu item to array' instead of 'add custom dynamic menu item to array'.

sval.val: $return = open custom menu: title=$title description=$description option array=$menu callback script='Menu.Template.SM' args=$args
Note that to retrieve $return, you must use 'add custom menu item to array' instead of 'add custom dynamic menu item to array'.
